amendment.description: Amendment appropriates $13.7 million for the National Senior Volunteer Corps.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, not preprinted in the Congressional Record, to increase funds appropriated in the bill for the Corporation for National and Comminity Service--Domestic Volunteer Service Programs, Operating Expenses by $13.8 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lazio amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.
